summary: Since his mother wants to watch TV, Axel, a young auto-mechanic, must recover her remote control, accidentally taken by his punk sister Maja. During his quest, he becomes involved in the ... See full summary »
cast: Björn Jörundur Friðbjörnsson|Þórarinn Eyfjörð|Thorarinn Oskar Thorarinsson|Helga Braga Jónsdóttir|Þóra Friðriksdóttir|Margrét Hugrún Gústavsdóttir|Sigurjón Kjartansson|Soley Eliasdottir|Óttarr Proppé|Ari Matthíasson|Erling Jóhannesson|Pétur Eggerz|Helgi Björnsson|Ólafur Guðmundsson|Björn Karlsson|Rósa Guðný Þórsdóttir|Guðný Helgadóttir|Árni Pétur Guðjónsson|Hjálmar Hjálmarsson|Joi Johannsson|Gígja Hilmarsdóttir|Eggert Þorleifsson|Stefan St. Sigurjonsson|Þröstur Guðbjartsson|Steinunn Ólafsdóttir|Skúli Gautason|Björgúlfur Egilsson|Björn Blöndal|Flosi Þorgeirsson|Baldur Maríusson|Sólveig Stefánsdóttir|Ingólfur Þór Guðmundsson|Þórir Steingrímsson|Þröstur Leó Gunnarsson|Valborg Baldvinsdóttir|Brynja Valdís Gísladóttir|Ingveldur Halldóra Benediktsen Húbertsdóttir|Sindri Magnússon
title: Mando a distancia
